text: The 1954 Arizona State Sun Devils football team was an American football team that represented Arizona State College (later renamed Arizona State University) in the Border Conference during the 1954 college football season. In their third and final season under head coach Clyde B. Smith, the Sun Devils compiled an 8–2–1 record (3–1 against Border opponents) and outscored their opponents by a combined total of 343 to 107. ==References== Arizona State Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:1954 in Arizona
title: 1954 Arizona State Sun Devils football team
